title: American Medical Association President on COVID-19 Recovery
description: American Medical Association President Dr. Susan Bailey discussed the COVID-19 pandemic and vaccine distribution at a virtual event hosted by the National Press Club. She talked about disparities in the health care system, calling racism the biggest threat to public health care, and later answered questions on the vaccine, partisan politics, and the road to recovery. Due to technical issues, the program was joined in progress.
